TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TitleCollection extends System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartNamedElementCollection`1<class System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Title>

remarks.format:
## Remarks The TitleCollection class is implemented as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Titles%2A> collection property of the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object.
<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Title> objects can be appended, inserted or removed from the collection at design time and run time.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Title Add(string name) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the title to add to the collection.
Docs.summary: Adds a object with the specified name to the end of the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A `string` value that represents the zero-based index of the added title.
